subject: Kentucky Derby
Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Barry Irwin, the loquacious chief of Team Valor, criticized trainers after Animal Kingdom’s victory and has since increased security for the colt.
snippet: Barry Irwin, the loquacious chief of Team Valor, criticized trainers after Animal Kingdom’s victory and has since increased security for the colt.
